Functions.name: get_file_query
Functions.description: Get all the contents in the file_query dictionary and return it. If the user request a file opening, always try calling open_file after this function is called

Functions.name: open_file
Functions.description: Open a file / program with the given path using its default configurations. Always try calling get_file_query first before calling this function. Return a boolean representing whether the file opening was successful or not

path.description: The path to the file, or program to open. The path can be a direct path to a file, or a key for the file_query dictionary. The keys of the dictionary can be get through the get_file_query function.
